attributes.action: stop the benefit  system that means people with multiple wives get multiple benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is appalling that anyone with multiple wives (which may I add is illegal in this country ) can now claim benefits for their second wives and families.It should be stopped straight away. If you live in this country you abide by our laws and do not have laws made especially for you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
